entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
